definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
(math.) theory of functions of a complex variable

sentences.english: In this paper, a successive approximation procedure for calculating eigenvalues of the complex characteristic equation is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了对复变特征方程求根的一种系统逼近程序。

sentences.english: A set of basic fluid mechanical equations is developed by the theory of functions of complex variables.
sentences.chinese: 利用复变函数的方法推导出相应的基本方程组。

sentences.english: Two-dimensional flow was dealt with using the method of functions of complex variables.
sentences.chinese: 运用复变函数论方法处理了二维流动。

sentences.english: Complex analysis is a classical and active branch of mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 复变函数是数学中既经典而又充满活力的一个分支。

sentences.english: The complex potential method and the boundary collocation method are applied in the calculation.
sentences.chinese: 计算过程中利用了复变函数方法和边界配置方法。

sentences.english: The displacement solution is constructed by applying the methods of complex function and multi polar coordinates system.
sentences.chinese: 利用复变函数和多极坐标方法构造了问题的位移解。

sentences.english: A calculation model was developed upon the elastic theory and the complex function theory.
sentences.chinese: 建立了基于弹性理论及复变函数理论的计算模型。

definition: calculus/differentiation and integration/calculus of infinitesimals 微 and integrals 積|积
further math/advanced mathematics (school subject, abbr. for 高等數學|高等数学)
